page.title: 16Children's Favourite Games 3
page.content: There are many games played indoors with the help of a television and video, these are very popular with the children.One of these is a game called "Firefox F-7".This game has 3 levels of difficulty and 6 'phases' to it.The aim of the game is to attack various targets which are being defended by a number of things aircraft, ships, tunnels and mines.The various attacks take place in the various 'phases' of the game and may involve one or more of the defenders trying to destroy you the attacker.The attack is controlled by the player using a 'Joy Stick' control to dodge and weave away from defenders and also shoot them down. If the player succesfully defeats the defenders in the first level then the game restarts on Level 2 which is more difficult,if the player fails to defeat the defence the game ends.
